_category_guidance.description: Outbound Campaigns for proactive customer outreach via voice, SMS, or email
prerequisites: Need a STANDARD queue (not AGENT queue)
Need a contact flow (OUTBOUND_WHISPER type preferred, or CONTACT_FLOW)
Need a claimed phone number: config_list_phone_numbers(instance_id)
workflow: 2. Get queue ID: list_queues(instance_id) - use STANDARD queue
3. Get contact flow ID: config_list_contact_flows(instance_id) - use OUTBOUND_WHISPER
4. Get phone numbers: config_list_phone_numbers(instance_id) - need claimed phone
6. Start campaign: campaigns_start(campaign_id) - REQUIRED before adding contacts
criticalNotes: ⚠️ Use IDs only, NOT full ARNs for connectContactFlowId and connectQueueId
⚠️ Campaign must be RUNNING before put_outbound_requests will work
⚠️ connectQueueId goes at telephony level, NOT inside defaultOutboundConfig
⚠️ Either provide connectSourcePhoneNumber OR use queue with claimed phone

defaultOutboundConfig.connectSourcePhoneNumber: +1XXXXXXXXXX (E.164 format, optional if queue has phone)

outboundModes.progressive: Agent-assisted, one call per available agent
